abstract: As the Fourth of July draws closer, news from the Anheuser-Busch battle has drawn to a crawl. The battle lines have been drawn, with InBev making noise about going hostile and Anheuser arguing that it can cut more costs and make more profits.
lead_paragraph: As the Fourth of July draws closer, news from the Anheuser-Busch battle has drawn to a crawl. The battle lines have been drawn, with InBev making noise about going hostile and Anheuser arguing that it can cut more costs and make more profits.
